summary: 调用ModifyNatGatewayAttribute接口修改NAT网关的名称和描述。

schema.description:
要修改的NAT网关所在的地域ID。 

您可以通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~36063~~)接口获取地域ID。

要修改的NAT网关名称。

名称长度为1～128个字符，不能以`http://`或`https://`开头。

要修改的NAT网关描述信息。

描述长度为1～128个字符，不能以`http://`或`https://`开头。

是否开启ICMP代回。取值：

- **true**（默认值）：开启。
- **false**：不开启。

修改NAT网关的EIP绑定模式。取值：可以为空，非空时只允许为**NAT**，表示绑定模式为EIP普通模式。


> - 只支持将**MULTI_BINDED**模式修改为**NAT**模式，不支持将**NAT**模式修改为**MULTI_BINDED**模式。关于**MULTI_BINDED**模式的具体信息，请参见[CreateNatGateway](~~120219~~)。
- 在EIP绑定模式切换过程中网络连接会出现秒级别闪断（闪断时间随着EIP数量增加而变长，目前最多支持绑定5个EIP的NAT网关进行配置变更），请您尽量在业务低峰期执行切换操作。
- EIP绑定模式变更为**NAT**后，公网NAT网关将兼容IPv4网关，但绑定一个公网EIP时将占用NAT网关所在交换机的一个私网IP，请确保NAT网关所在交换机内私网IP地址充足，如果NAT网关所在的交换机没有可用的空闲私网地址时，将无法绑定新的EIP。

是否开启会话日志，取值：

- **true**：已开启会话日志。

- **false**：已关闭会话日志。

LogDeliveryType.description: 会话日志写入类型。取值：**sls**，阿里云日志服务SLS。

400.errorMessage: The feature of %s is not supported.
NATGW status is invalid.
The param of %s and %s are mutually exclusive.
The status of natgateway is incorrect.
The specified resource of %s depends on %s, so the operation cannot be completed.
The feature of IcmpReplyEnabled is not supported.
The parameter must not be null, name or description or icmpReplyEnabled
The specified Name is not valid.
The specified Description is not valid.
The VPC NAT gateway is not support to change EIP bond type.
The normal NAT gateway is not support to change EIP bond type.
The EIP bond type is already NAT type.
The security protection enabled NAT gateway is not support change EIP bond type.
The quota of %s is exceeded, binded: %s, quota: %s.
The available private Ip number is not enough in your subnet.
The VPC NAT gateway is not supported to enable security protection.
The NAT gateway status is invalid.
The NAT gateway has EIP in invalid status.
The NAT gateway has SNAT entry in invalid status.
The NAT gateway has DNAT entry in invalid status.
The NAT with Mutil-Binded Eip bind type is not support enable firewall.
The instance is locked due to outstanding payments.
The NAT gateway is not support to change PrivateLinkMode.
The specified Delivery Destination is illegal.
Operation failed because the user is not authorized to deliver NAT session log.
The specified Delivery Type is illegal.
The feature of EnableSessionLog is not supported.

403.errorMessage: Authentication is failed for modify EIP bond type.

404.errorMessage: The specified RegionId does not exist in our records.
The specified NatGatewayId does not exist in our records.

500.errorMessage: Failed to configure session log due to a temporary failure of the server.

title: 修改NAT网关的名称和描述
description: 本接口查询的NAT网关包括公网NAT网关和VPC NAT网关，文中出现的“NAT网关”不做具体的区分。
